How Vision-AI Works

One unified system. Two cameras. Complete safety coverage.

1

Dual Camera Input

Front camera monitors your face for drowsiness. Rear camera (or dashcam) watches the road ahead.

2

Vision-AI Processing

TensorFlow.js + YOLO models run locally in your browser. No data leaves your device.

3

Unified Risk Assessment

VASE combines both signals into a single Safety Status: Safe, Caution, or High-Risk.

4

Instant Life-Saving Alerts

Visual warnings, audio alarms, and emergency SMS/calls when danger is detected.

What Vision-AI Detects

Animals

Cow, Dog, Buffalo, Deer

Road Hazards

Potholes, Debris, Fallen Trees

Vehicles

Wrong-way, Broken-down

Infrastructure

Barriers, Construction, Black Spots

People

Pedestrians, Cyclists

Natural

Landslides, Flooding

Driver Drowsiness Detection

Using TensorFlow.js face mesh and eye tracking, Vision-AI monitors driver alertness in real-time:

  • Eye Aspect Ratio (EAR) monitoring
  • Blink frequency analysis
  • If alertness drops below 50%, triggers alarm
  • Optional SMS/call to emergency contact
Real-time Alertness
45% Alert Triggered

Why Vision-AI Exists

Every day in India, over 400 families lose a loved one to road accidents. A father driving home from work. A student on their way to college. A truck driver providing for their family.

Most of these accidents are preventable. A cow on NH-44 at night. A pothole that wasn't visible. A driver who dozed off for just a second. Moments that change lives forever.

Vision-AI exists because we believe one alert can save a life. One warning about an animal ahead. One alarm when eyes start closing. One notification to emergency contacts.

1 Alert
Can Save a Life
1 Family
Stays Together
2 Seconds
Early Warning Matters
Every Road
Made Safer
"We can't prevent every accident, but we can give everyone a fighting chance. That's what Vision-AI is about."
